doc.field: Julius Robinson beneficiary membership certificate from the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115
Julius Robinson beneficiary membership certificate from the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115

One certificate, dated 1880, stating that Julius Robinson has achieved the "Degree of Manhood" and is a beneficiary member of the Supreme Lodge of the Knights of Honor, a fraternal organization. The certficate is given under the seal of the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115, New York City.

One certificate, dated 1880, stating that Julius Robinson has achieved the "Degree of Manhood" and is a beneficiary member of the Supreme Lodge of the Knights of Honor, a fraternal organization. The certficate is given under the seal of the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115, New York City.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
